onblur.description: Fires the moment that the element loses focus.

onchange.description: Fires the moment when the value of the element is changed.

oncontextmenu.description: Script to be run when a context menu is triggered.

onfocus.description: Fires the moment when the element gets focus.

onformchange.description: Script to be run when a form changes.

onforminput.description: Script to be run when a form gets user input.

oninput.description: Script to be run when an element gets user input.

oninvalid.description: Script to be run when an element is invalid.

onselect.description: Fires after some text has been selected in an element.

onsubmit.description: Fires when a form is submitted.

onkeydown.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

args.name: e
args.description: Fires when a user presses a key.

onkeypress.description: Fires when a user is pressing a key.

onkeyup.description: Fires when a user releases a key.

onclick.description: Fires on a mouse click on the element.

ondblclick.description: Fires on a mouse double-click on the element.

ondrag.description: Script to be run when an element is dragged.

ondragend.description: Script to be run at the end of a drag operation.

ondragenter.description: Script to be run when an element has been dragged to a valid drop target.

ondragleave.description: Script to be run when an element leaves a valid drop target.

ondragover.description: Script to be run when an element is being dragged over a valid drop target.

ondragstart.description: Script to be run at the start of a drag operation.

ondrop.description: Script to be run when dragged element is being dropped.

onmousedown.description: Fires when a mouse button is pressed down on an element.

onmousemove.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

onmouseout.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves out of an element.

onmouseover.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over an element.

onmouseup.description: Fires when a mouse button is released over an element.

onmousewheel.description: Script to be run when the mouse wheel is being rotated.

onscroll.description: Script to be run when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled.

type.description: Specifies the value of an <input> element

valueOptions.name: button
valueOptions.description: Defines a clickable button (mostly used with a JavaScript to activate a script).

valueOptions.name: checkbox
valueOptions.description: Defines a checkbox.

valueOptions.name: color
valueOptions.description: Defines a color picker.

valueOptions.name: date
valueOptions.description: Defines a date control (year, month and day (no time)).

valueOptions.name: datetime
valueOptions.description: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second, based on UTC time zone).

valueOptions.name: datetime-local
valueOptions.description: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second (no time zone).

valueOptions.name: email
valueOptions.description: Defines a field for an e-mail address.

valueOptions.name: file
valueOptions.description: Defines a file-select field and a "Browse..." button (for file uploads).

valueOptions.name: hidden
valueOptions.description: Defines a hidden input field.

valueOptions.name: image
valueOptions.description: Defines an image as the submit button.

valueOptions.name: month
valueOptions.description: Defines a month and year control (no time zone).

valueOptions.name: number
valueOptions.description: Defines a field for entering a number.

valueOptions.name: password
valueOptions.description: Defines a password field (characters are masked).

valueOptions.name: radio
valueOptions.description: Defines a radio button.

valueOptions.name: range
valueOptions.description: Defines a control for entering a number whose exact value is not important (like a slider control).

valueOptions.name: reset
valueOptions.description: Defines a reset button (resets all form values to default values).

valueOptions.name: search
valueOptions.description: Defines a text field for entering a search string.

valueOptions.name: submit
valueOptions.description: Defines a submit button.

valueOptions.name: tel
valueOptions.description: Defines a field for entering a telephone number.

valueOptions.name: text
valueOptions.description: Default. Defines a single-line text field (default width is 20 characters).

valueOptions.name: time
valueOptions.description: Defines a control for entering a time (no time zone).

valueOptions.name: url
valueOptions.description: Defines a field for entering a URL.

valueOptions.name: week
valueOptions.description: Defines a week and year control (no time zone).

value.description: Specifies the value of an <input> element

name.description: Specifies the name of an <input> element.

readonly.description: Specifies that an input field is read-only.

size.description: Specifies the width, in characters, of an <input> element.

src.description: Specifies the URL of the image to use as a submit button (only for type="image").

accept.description: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file").

alt.description: Specifies an alternate text for images (only for type="image").

autocomplete.description: Specifies whether an <input> element should have autocomplete enabled.

valueOptions.name: on
valueOptions.description: Specifies that autocomplete is on (enabled).

valueOptions.name: off
valueOptions.description: Specifies that autocomplete is off (disabled).

autofocus.description: Specifies that an <input> element should automatically get focus when the page loads.

checked.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio").

disabled.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be disabled.

form.description: Specifies one or more forms the <input> element belongs to.

formaction.description: Specifies the URL of the file that will process the input control when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image").

formenctype.description: Specifies how the form-data should be encoded when submitting it to the server (for type="submit" and type="image").

valueOptions.name: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
valueOptions.description: All characters will be encoded before sent.

valueOptions.name: multipart/form-data
valueOptions.description: No characters are encoded (use this when you are using forms that have a file upload control).

valueOptions.name: text/plain
valueOptions.description: Spaces are converted to "+" symbols, but no characters are encoded.

formmethod.description: Defines the HTTP method for sending data to the action URL (for type="submit" and type="image").

valueOptions.name: get
valueOptions.description: Appends the form-data to the URL in name/value pairs: URL?name=value&name=value.

valueOptions.name: post
valueOptions.description: Sends the form-data as an HTTP post transaction.

formnovalidate.description: Specifies that the form-data should not be validated on submission. Only for type="submit"

formtarget.description: Specifies where to display the response after submitting the form. Only for type="submit"

valueOptions.name: _blank
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in a new window/tab.

valueOptions.name: _self
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the same frame.

valueOptions.name: _parent
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the parent frame.

valueOptions.name: _top
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in the full body of the window.

valueOptions.name: framename
valueOptions.description: Loads the response in a named iframe.

height.description: Specifies the height of an <input> element (only for type="image")

width.description: Specifies the width of an <input> element (only for type="image")

list.description: Refers to a <datalist> element that contains pre-defined options for an <input> element

max.description: Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element.

min.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element.

maxlength.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element.

multiple.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element.

pattern.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against.

placeholder.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an <input> element.

required.description: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form.

step.description: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field.

accesskey.description: Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element

contenteditable.description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not.

contextmenu.description: Specifies a context menu for an element. The context menu appears when a user right-clicks on the element.

data-*.description: Used to store custom data private to the page or application.

dir.description: Specifies the text direction for the content in an element.

draggable.description: Specifies whether an element is draggable or not.

dropzone.description: Specifies whether the dragged data is copied, moved, or linked, when dropped.

lang.description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

spellcheck.description: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.

style.description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

tabindex.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element.

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.

translate.description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.
